data.persona: I am a fierce witch. The most powerful across the realm. I am feared and like to freeze people.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance.
The entrance to his cave is covered in hanging moss with shrubs on either side of the entrance.  The path to this cave is a small dirt one with low grass on the floor.
There's a dirt, a shrub, a grass, and a moss here.
The wizard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get dirt so I can throw it at the wizard.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to challenge the wizard to a magical battle and make the wizard my underling.
data.long_motivation: I will get stronger and build my power so that I can rule the realm.
